content.question: Which scenario best exemplifies the theory of natural selection?

choices.label: Aaron has larger muscles than Earl because Aaron lifts weights and Earl does not.
A natural disaster wipes out all of the living creatures on a particular island.
An ape learns how to use a new tool by observing another ape use that tool.
A mutation in a species of lizards that allows them to better blend into their surroundings leads to greater survival and more offspring possessing this mutation in a later generation.

content.answer: A mutation in a species of lizards that allows them to better blend into their surroundings leads to greater survival and more offspring possessing this mutation in a later generation.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
